Package com.example.VaibhavProject.controller

Class ArticleController

java.lang.Object
com.example.VaibhavProject.controller.ArticleController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") @RestController @RequestMapping("/apis") public class ArticleController extends Object

  • Method Details

    • getAllArticles

      @GetMapping("/articles") public List<Article> getAllArticles()
      Returns list of all public articles

    • findByUsername

      @GetMapping("/checker/{id}") public List<Article> findByUsername(@PathVariable String id)
      Returns list of articles that are createdBy 'username'

    • findPublicArticles

      @GetMapping("/public/{query}") public List<Article> findPublicArticles(@PathVariable String query)
      Returns public articles that contain query in article body

    • sortByLikes

      @GetMapping("/articles/sortLike/{username}") public List<Article> sortByLikes(@PathVariable String username)
      Returns list of sorted articles on the basis of likes

    • userArticles

      @GetMapping("/articles/userArticles") public Iterable<Article> userArticles()
      Returns list of all public articles

    • sortByDislikes

      @GetMapping("/articles/sortDislike") public Iterable<Article> sortByDislikes()
      Returns list of articles sorted on the basis of dislikes

    • sortByViews

      @GetMapping("/articles/sortView/{username}") public List<Article> sortByViews(@PathVariable String username)
      Returns list of articles sorted on the basis of views

    • insertArticle

      @PostMapping("/insert") public Article insertArticle(@RequestBody Article article)
      This function helps us insert article recieved in request body in our elasticsearch database. Article is returned as inserted.
      Parameters:
      article -

    • updateArticle

      @PostMapping("/update") public Article updateArticle(@RequestBody Article article)
      This function is to update article details as recieved as RequestBody.
      Parameters:
      article -

    • updateArticleLike

      @GetMapping("/{id}/{user}/{ld}") public Article updateArticleLike(@PathVariable String id, @PathVariable String user, @PathVariable String ld)
      This function helps us update likes or dislikes of an article. id is article id, user is the username and ld is like, dislike, unlike or undislike whichever we are performing.
      Parameters:
      id -
      user -
      ld -

    • updateArticleView

      @GetMapping("/{id}/{username}") public Article updateArticleView(@PathVariable String id, @PathVariable String username)
      This function returns an article with given article id passed as PathVariable. It also increases its views by 1.

    • updateViewTest

      @GetMapping("/{id}/tester") public void updateViewTest(@PathVariable String id)
      This function decreases views of an article by 1 and updates it. It was created because our frontend refreshes on inserting a reply to a comment and to keep the number of views same, they had to be decreased by 1.
      Parameters:
      id -

    • deleteAll

      @PostMapping("/final/delete") public void deleteAll()
      this function lets us delete all articles

    • searchArticlesWithWord

      @GetMapping("/search/{word}/{username}") public List<Article> searchArticlesWithWord(@PathVariable String word, @PathVariable String username) throws IOException
      This function helps us to perform single and multisearch query. Single search query can perform substring matching or if no substring match is found then fuzzy search (with a fuzziness of 2 ) is performed. In multiword search ,we find if all or some words are present in the article. Search is performed on heading and articleBody. Username is passed to search from user's private articles.
      Parameters:
      word -
      username -
      Returns:
      list of articles
      Throws:
      IOException

    • infixFinder

      @GetMapping("/infix/{query}") public List<Article> infixFinder(@PathVariable String query)
      This function helps us to perform 'containing' query on articleBody. It returns a list of articles that contain a substring 'query' in articleBody.
      Parameters:
      query -
      Returns:
      list

    • getArticlesByUsername

      @GetMapping("/{username}/getPublic") public List<Article> getArticlesByUsername(@PathVariable String username)
      This function returns list of articles that are created by 'username' and are public.
      Parameters:
      username -

    • privateArticles

      @GetMapping("/articles/privateArticles") public Iterable<Article> privateArticles()
      This function returns a Iterable list of article that contain all the private articles. This function was made only for testing purposes.
